titleStmt.title: A treatise of the loue of God. Written in french by B. Francis de Sales Bishope and Prince of Geneua, translated into English by Miles Car priest of the English Colledge of Doway
Traité de l'amour de Dieu. English
titleStmt.author: Francis, de Sales, Saint, 1567-1622.
Carre, Thomas, 1599-1674.
Baes, Martin, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Gerard Pinchon, at the signe of Coleyn,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Traité de l'amour de Dieu.
With an additional title page, engraved, with title "The loue of God", signed: M. Baes fecit.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
